price: Na watakuwa nao wanawake wenye macho ya staha mazuri.
footnotes: Na watu hawa wat'iifu walioko Peponi watakuwa nao mahuruleini walio safi, wema, macho yao hayawatazami ila waume zao tu, basi hawayatafuti matamanio maovu, jicho la mwema haliangalii ila mema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
